price: Hakika Sisi tunatosha kukukinga na wanao kejeli.
footnotes: Na hao washirikina wanao ukejeli wito wako hawatokushinda, wala hawatoweza kukuingilia kati baina yako na wito wako.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
